verses.verse: It happened, <S%H4428><s%> when all the kings who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> and in the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> and on all the shore <S%H2348><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> heard of it <S%H8085><s%>
that they gathered <S%H6908><s%> themselves together <S%H3162><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> accord. <S%H6310><s%>
But when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> what Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and to Ai, <S%H5857><s%>

they also resorted <S%H6213><s%> to a ruse, <S%H6195><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> and made as if they had been ambassadors, <S%H6737><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> old <S%H1087><s%> sacks <S%H8242><s%> on their donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> and wineskins, <S%H4997><s%> <S%H3196><s%> old <S%H1087><s%> and torn <S%H1234><s%> and bound up, <S%H6887><s%>

and old <S%H1087><s%> and patched <S%H2921><s%> shoes <S%H5275><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and wore old <S%H1087><s%> garments. <S%H8008><s%> All the bread <S%H3899><s%> of their provision <S%H6718><s%> was dry <S%H3001><s%> and moldy. <S%H5350><s%>

They went <S%H3212><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H376><s%> and to the men of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "We have come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country. <S%H776><s%> Now therefore make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with us. <S%H1285><s%>"

The men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> "What <S%H194><s%> if you live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us. <S%H3772><s%> How could we make a covenant with you? <S%H1285><s%>"
They said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "We are your servants. <S%H5650><s%>" Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H370><s%> "Who are you? Where do you come from? <S%H935><s%>"

They said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5650><s%> "Your servants have come <S%H935><s%> from a very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> because of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> for we have heard <S%H8085><s%> of his fame, <S%H8089><s%> all that he did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

and all that he did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and to Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> who was at Ashtaroth. <S%H6252><s%>

Our elders <S%H2205><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of our country <S%H776><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to us, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H3947><s%> 'Take provision <S%H6720><s%> in your <S%H3027><s%> hand for the journey, <S%H1870><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> and tell them, <S%H5650><s%> "We are your servants. Now make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with us. <S%H1285><s%>"'

This our bread <S%H3899><s%> we took hot <S%H2525><s%> for our provision <S%H6679><s%> out of our houses <S%H1004><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> we went out <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> to you; <S%H3001><s%> but now, behold, it is dry, and has become moldy. <S%H5350><s%>

These wineskins, <S%H4997><s%> <S%H3196><s%> which we filled, <S%H4390><s%> were new; <S%H2319><s%> and behold, <S%H1234><s%> they are torn. These our garments <S%H8008><s%> and our shoes <S%H5275><s%> have become old <S%H1086><s%> because of the very <S%H3966><s%> long <S%H7230><s%> journey. <S%H1870><s%>"
The men <S%H582><s%> sampled <S%H3947><s%> their provisions, <S%H6718><s%> and didn't <S%H7592><s%> ask counsel from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with them, <S%H6213><s%> and made a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, <S%H2421><s%> to let them live. The princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> swore to them. <S%H7650><s%>

It happened at the end <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> they had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, <S%H8085><s%> that they heard that they were their neighbors, <S%H7138><s%> and that they lived <S%H3427><s%> among them. <S%H7130><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to their cities <S%H5892><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Now their cities <S%H5892><s%> were Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> Beeroth, <S%H881><s%> and Kiriath Jearim. <S%H7157><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> didn't <S%H5221><s%> strike them, <S%H5387><s%> because the princes of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against the princes. <S%H5387><s%>

But all the princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> "We have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> now therefore we may <S%H3201><s%> not touch them. <S%H5060><s%>
This we will do <S%H6213><s%> to them, <S%H2421><s%> and let them live; lest wrath <S%H7110><s%> be on us, <S%H7621><s%> because of the oath which we swore to them. <S%H7650><s%>"

The princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2421><s%> "Let them live, so they became wood <S%H6086><s%> cutters <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for all the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> as the princes <S%H5387><s%> had spoken to them. <S%H1696><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for them, <S%H1696><s%> and he spoke to them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Why have you deceived <S%H7411><s%> us, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H3966><s%> 'We are very far <S%H7350><s%> from you, <S%H3427><s%>' when you live among us? <S%H7130><s%>

Now therefore you are cursed, <S%H779><s%> and some of you will never fail <S%H3772><s%> to be bondservants, <S%H5650><s%> both wood <S%H6086><s%> cutters <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God. <S%H430><s%>"

They answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Because your servants <S%H5650><s%> were certainly <S%H5046><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> how Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you all the land, <S%H776><s%> and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H3966><s%> Therefore we were very afraid <S%H3372><s%> for our lives <S%H5315><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you, <S%H6213><s%> and have done this thing. <S%H1697><s%>
Now, <S%H2009><s%> behold, we are in your hand. <S%H3027><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> to us as it seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> to you to do. <S%H6213><s%>"
He did <S%H6213><s%> so to them, <S%H5337><s%> and delivered them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> so that they didn't <S%H2026><s%> kill them.

That day <S%H3117><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> them wood <S%H6086><s%> cutters <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and for the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he should choose. <S%H977><s%>
